name: Wild! Dungeon Defense!
description:
Wild! Dungeon Defense!

Made for Godot Wild! Jam #33

Welcome to, Wild! Dungeon Defense where you play as the Evil Curator of a local Dungeon where Heros far and wide come to steal your loot! Can you believe it? "Heros"....Here, in YOUR dungeon... attempting to steal YOUR hard ear-..... usurped Loot! How dare them! 

Place traps to deal with the pesky Heros as they and you advance through your Dungeon!

Controls:
  • Esc or Space  to Pause
  • Scroll Wheel to rotate traps.
  • Left click to select and place traps.
  • Right click to drop current held trap
  • D + MouseOver to destroy current placed trap.
  • Mouse Over traps for details
Heros:

Each hero has a unique ability, their class determines their HP.

Heros health increase based on wave and level.

  • Fighter: 25% All Damage Reduction
  • Monk: 50% Projectile Damage Reduction (Physical and Magical)
  • Rogue: Disables "triggered" traps in a radius for 2 seconds.
  • Wizard: When damage is received he blinks himself and others heros on their path!
Level Advancement:

Each level has a gold threshold to obtain in order to unlock the next  level of your dungeon.
